Sentencas: Developing a reliable and high-performing direct hydrocarbon symmetric solid oxide fuel cells (S-SOFCs) is promising to achieve the simple and durable operation in natural gas.
Titulo: High-performing and stable electricity generation by ceramic fuel cells operating in dry methane over 1000 hours

Sentencas: Here we demonstrate a durable S-SOFC with a ceramic oxide material simultaneously used as symmetric electrode that performs outstandingly in dry methane at anode side and ambient air at cathode side.
Titulo: High-performing and stable electricity generation by ceramic fuel cells operating in dry methane over 1000 hours

Sentencas: This cell shows high performance with strong resistances against both coking and sulfur poisoning in dry fuel without any steam as reforming agent.
Titulo: High-performing and stable electricity generation by ceramic fuel cells operating in dry methane over 1000 hours

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, the cell exhibits a low polarization resistance of 0.027 Omega cm(2) in air and 0.074 Omega cm(2) in 5% H-2.
Titulo: High-performing and stable electricity generation by ceramic fuel cells operating in dry methane over 1000 hours

Sentencas: When the cell is further optimized by implementing a nanostructured electrode, the high peak power densities of 1.05 W cm(-2) in H-2 and 0.4 W cm(-2) in CH4 are achieved at 800 degrees C. To our best knowledge, this is the highest performance among S-SOFCs using ceramic oxide as symmetric electrode in dry methane.
Titulo: High-performing and stable electricity generation by ceramic fuel cells operating in dry methane over 1000 hours

Sentencas: The cell exhibits a very stable performance under a constant current load of 1.0 A cm(-2) for 1060 h with even slight performance increase.
Titulo: High-performing and stable electricity generation by ceramic fuel cells operating in dry methane over 1000 hours

Sentencas: In addition, the electrode is structurally stable in various fuels, suggesting that the cell can be operated in flexible gas conditions.
Titulo: High-performing and stable electricity generation by ceramic fuel cells operating in dry methane over 1000 hours
